messages.content:
The error in your Gatsby configuration is related to the "gatsby-source-wordpress" plugin. The error message states that the "url" option is required but missing.

To fix the issue, you need to provide a valid URL for the WordPress source in the plugin's options. Update the "baseUrl" option with the correct URL of your WordPress site. For example:

```javascript
{
  resolve: `gatsby-source-wordpress`,
  options: {
    baseUrl: `https://example.com`, // Replace with your WordPress URL
    protocol: `https`,
    hostingWPCOM: false,
    includedRoutes: [
      '**/pages',
      '**/posts',
      '**/tags',
      '**/categories'
    ]
  }
}
```

Make sure to replace `"https://example.com"` with the actual URL of your WordPress site.

If your WordPress site is hosted at `bloom.pm`, you need to make sure to include the protocol (`https://`) in the `baseUrl` option. Update the plugin configuration as follows:

```javascript
{
  resolve: `gatsby-source-wordpress`,
  options: {
    baseUrl: `https://bloom.pm`, // Include the protocol (https://)
    protocol: `https`,
    hostingWPCOM: false,
    includedRoutes: [
      '**/pages',
      '**/posts',
      '**/tags',
      '**/categories'
    ]
  }
}
```

Ensure that you have the correct protocol (`http` or `https`) and that the URL `https://bloom.pm` is accessible.
